short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically toggle between YouTube, Panopto, or Leccap, and Spotify with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your media consumption and enhance focus with Lecture Music Switch, a Chrome extension designed to manage playback across multiple video and music platforms. Whether you're alternating between educational content on YouTube and Leccap, engaging lecture series on Panopto, or enjoying your favorite tunes on Spotify, Lecture Music Switch ensures you never miss a beat

With just a click of an icon, our extension detects which platform you're actively using and toggles playback automatically. If you hit play on a YouTube video, Lecture Music Switch pauses Spotify, allowing you to concentrate on your video without distraction. Switch to a lecture on Panopto or Leccap, and your music awaits in pause mode until you’re ready to groove again – seamless and effortless.
